issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
The "Photo Albums" don't appear after launching the application until shaking the device. Occurs on iPad.

This is not a regression it occurs on SDK 2.0.1.GA2

Steps to reproduce:
1) Launch refactored Kitchen Sink (Kevin Winnerey/Developer relations version) > Phone
2) â€¨Tap on 'Photo Gallery".

Actual result:
Can't choose a picture, there is no "Photo Albums".
Shake the device to get "Photo Albums".

Expected result:
"Photo Albums" should appear after launching the application.
fields.summary: KitchenSink:  Phone > Photo Gallery: on iPad "Photo Albums" appear after shaking a device
fields.environment:
iPad2 (4.3.5) , iPad2 (5.1)
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207171343
SDK version: 2.0.1.GA2 and 2.1.1.v20120727140110

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
